abstract.para: This book contains course notes covering Enterprise Development with Java. The course provides end-to-end coverage of topics from the development environment and data tier to services and web access deployed on the server-side. The focus is on architecture and APIs but grounded in implementation.

listitem.para: Course combines a mixture of presentation, discussion, and lab exercises to provide an introduction and thorough coverage of Enterprise Java (JavaEE)
Concepts are based on JavaEE standards and grounded using a specific JavaEE provider (JBoss/Wildfly Application Server)
Lab environment is based on Maven and IDE agnostic (this is not an IDE wizard course)
